item.title: Updating Debian Kernel Only
item.description: sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install linux-virtual See details in https://www.digitalocean.com/community/tutorials/how-to-update-a-digitalocean-server-s-kernel#upgrading-only-the-latest-kernel
